instruction: Generate a list of criteria to assess a research paper
output:
- Quality of the research design 
- The quality and relevance of collected data 
- Clarity and consistency of the paper 
- Appropriateness of choice of methods 
- Accuracy of claim and argumentation 
- Depth and breadth of literature review 
- Quality of the discussion
- Relevance of conclusion 
- Relevance of implications 
- Professionalism of the presentation 
- Quality of the bibliographic data
